title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message:
Board is clean. No history available. I'll guess it could have been dropped. 

It doesn't want to load OS. Stops at loading bar at the very end. Something holding it back.

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message: Have you tried a new HDD and SATA cable??? This sounds like literally a bad HDD or SATA cable.....

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message: Forgot to say that it won?t boot with bare board only. Screen and external good drive are connected. I?ve even tried pendrive OSX, but nothing.

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message: Ohhh gotcha. Yeah this one could suck. PCH getting burning hot by chance? This could really be anything, so inspect very closely for any hints of corrosion near SMC, U1900, the BIOS etc.

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message:
PRAM reset done?
Tried SMC bypass mode?
This could be a sign of corrupted ME also.
ASD EFI reports any error?
Try one RAM module at a time.

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message:
PRAM, SMC and RAM one at a time - no change.
Shall I try to reflash BIOS? (ofc save backup)
Maybe first go with ASD EFI?

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message: Do the BIOS, clean ME for sure.

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message:
I've done BIOS. No change. I see that SMC area doesn't have glue around, might have been reworked before. That's the only sign that I can see on this board.

The work that has been done on this board is LCD connector replacement. Customer claims it worked before replacement. I don't see any reason why a connector would be stopping it from booting, except that backlight driver could be misbehaving on SCL and SDA lines?

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message:
"I've done BIOS."
Are you sure about clean ME?

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message:
Not sure. I've downloaded one that's supposed to be "clean" from Ghostlyhaks Forum. Used it already before for other machines, they turned on fine.

I've mounted SSD to it with SATA cable. It loads instantly to 3/4 then goes really slow.

title: 820-2936-A won't boot to OS, stop at loading bar
message: Please upload the original BIOS from the board to have the ME fixed.
